name: Fnotepad
tagline: Firefox addon for adding Pin tab to be used as NotePad in browser window
body:
### FnotePad.
Firefox addon for adding Pin tab to be used as NotePad in browser window.
one click on FnotePad toolbar button and you got a editable window to be used as notepad with in your browser window.

### Author: @AshishNamdev
### Support :  Having trouble with FnotePad ?
 contact :  ashish28.sirt@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
